text: Anɨb ak chɨn nopun, gɨnɨgel ma gɨnɨgel takaw ned nɨb anɨb ak, kɨles ma mɨdɨl chɨnop gɨtep gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Pen tap ogɨnap gek mɨdtep gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Anɨb ak tek God ne takaw ned nɨb anɨb ak pɨsnep kelɨgup. Pɨsnep kelɨgɨl, kanɨb tep kɨdeyɨl olap chɨnop yomɨl, kanɨb kɨdeyɨl abun adek anɨb ak, tep yɨbɨl. Amɨl gos sek kod mɨdɨl, am am God yɨl yonɨgabun.
